top_users: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS user_total_points_view AS SELECT user_id,  user_nickname,  total_points FROM   user ORDER BY     total_points DESC LIMIT 5
top_attention_seekers_view: CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS top_attention_seekers_view AS SELECT user_nickname, SUM(CASE WHEN a.activity_subtype='MENTION_ALL' THEN 50+points WHEN a.activity_subtype='MENTION_ROLE' THEN 20+points WHEN a.activity_subtype='MENTION_CHANNEL' THEN 10+points WHEN a.activity_subtype='MENTION_USER' THEN 5+points ELSE points END) as attention_points FROM useractivity a JOIN user b on a.user_id = b.id GROUP BY user_nickname ORDER BY attention_points DESC LIMIT 5;
